overview:
Dean Murtagh has over 20 years Sales experience in the IT industry mainly focussed on solutions for large organisations. Starting in sales working for US based vendors, both in the UK and internationally, Deanâ€™s career has progressed from Business Development to Major Accounts, before moving into Sales Management 15 years ago with companies such as Wall Data, Eicon Technology, Quadritek and Lucent Technologies.

In 2000 Dean joined tuscany networks as Sales Manager before being appointed to Sales Director in 2002 where he developed and refined an efficient structured sales approach which has been instrumental in winning significant new customers, while growing the installed base strongly. In 2010 tuscany were acquired by Accumuli PLC and Dean has remained as Sales Director of the new trading company with responsibility for overall sales and creating a new Sales infrastructure.
